title: Example not working
body:
Hello,
thanks for the project. Using ComfyUI . 0.3.14 The example 
workflows/t2mv_sdxl_diffusers.json

is not working.

error when queuing:
```
Prompt outputs failed validation
DiffusersMVSampler:
- Return type mismatch between linked nodes: pipeline, received_type(MAKED_PIPELINE) mismatch input_type(PIPELINE)
```
author: onthegit

comments.body: See #44. Have fixed it. Please try the latest version.

title: Conflicting Nodes
body:
Several nodes from `ComfyUI-Diffusers` appear to have been pasted into this repo but without changing the names. 

In my case, this made the example workflows not work. But this could also break other existing workflows, depending on how Comfy's order of loading the nodes.

If these nodes need be forked, please consider more unique names.

ComfyUI-MVAdapter nodes:

```
    "LdmPipelineLoader": LdmPipelineLoader,
    "LdmVaeLoader": LdmVaeLoader,
    "DiffusersPipelineLoader": DiffusersPipelineLoader,
    "DiffusersVaeLoader": DiffusersVaeLoader,
    "DiffusersSchedulerLoader": DiffusersSchedulerLoader,
    "DiffusersModelMakeup": DiffusersModelMakeup,
    "LoraModelLoader": LoraModelLoader,
    "DiffusersSampler": DiffusersSampler,
    "DiffusersMVSampler": DiffusersMVSampler,
    "BiRefNet": BiRefNet,
    "ImagePreprocessor": ImagePreprocessor,
    "ControlNetModelLoader": ControlNetModelLoader,
    "ControlImagePreprocessor": ControlImagePreprocessor,
    "ViewSelector": ViewSelector,
```

ComfyUI-Diffusers node list:

```
    "DiffusersPipelineLoader": DiffusersPipelineLoader,
    "DiffusersVaeLoader": DiffusersVaeLoader,
    "DiffusersSchedulerLoader": DiffusersSchedulerLoader,
    "DiffusersModelMakeup": DiffusersModelMakeup,
    "DiffusersClipTextEncode": DiffusersClipTextEncode,
    "DiffusersSampler": DiffusersSampler,
    "CreateIntListNode": CreateIntListNode,
    "LcmLoraLoader": LcmLoraLoader,
    "StreamDiffusionCreateStream": StreamDiffusionCreateStream,
    "StreamDiffusionSampler": StreamDiffusionSampler,
    "StreamDiffusionWarmup": StreamDiffusionWarmup,
    "StreamDiffusionFastSampler": StreamDiffusionFastSampler,
```
author: jelling

comments.body: Hi, welcome to submit pull requests!

title: Support for V-prediction sdxl model
body: i want to generate multi views on a v-pred sdxl model, but i  find no where to aplly v-pred.
author: sd2530615

comments.body: Hi! The model was trained on the official eps-prediction SDXL model, so I don't think it can be applied on any v-pred SDXL variants.

title: num_views is unused
body: in code utils.py line 290, the elevation_deg=[0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0], if change the input num_views, will be error.
author: civen-cn

comments.body: Hi, our currently open-source model is only trained on 6 perspectives with an elevation of 0, so it works well only for generating images from these 6 views. Our arbitrary view generation model is not yet publicly available. We do not recommend changing `num_views`. If available, we will update our README. Thanks for your attention.
Will you train on 8 views in the future ? with backside views ?

title: Max retries exceeded with url: /CompVis/stable-diffusion/main/configs/stable-diffusion/v1-inference.yaml
body:
the node auto-connected github and downloaded models--stabilityai--stable-diffusion-xl-base-1.0, even if models--stabilityai--stable-diffusion-xl-base-1.0 in cache dir already exists.

I close the internet in case of ultralytics events, so I have to open the internet when testing mvadapter node.

Can author checking the **models--stabilityai--stable-diffusion-xl-base-1.0** in cache dir first?




Detailed comfyui console message:
During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):

    return_values = _map_node_over_list(obj, input_data_all, obj.FUNCTION, allow_interrupt=True, execution_block_cb=execution_block_cb, pre_execute_cb=pre_execute_cb)
                    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

    process_inputs(input_dict, i)
  File "F:\ComfyUI_windows_portable\ComfyUI\execution.py", line 159, in process_inputs
    results.append(getattr(obj, func)(**inputs))
                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\ComfyUI_windows_portable\ComfyUI\custom_nodes\ComfyUI-MVAdapter\nodes.py", line 158, in create_pipeline
    vae = vae_pt_to_vae_diffuser(
          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\ComfyUI_windows_portable\ComfyUI\custom_nodes\ComfyUI-MVAdapter\utils.py", line 243, in vae_pt_to_vae_diffuser
    r = requests.get(
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\ComfyUI_windows_portable\python_embeded\Lib\site-packages\requests\api.py", line 73, in get
    return request("get", url, params=params, **kwargs)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\ComfyUI_windows_portable\python_embeded\Lib\site-packages\requests\api.py", line 59, in request
    return session.request(method=method, url=url, **kwargs)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\ComfyUI_windows_portable\python_embeded\Lib\site-packages\requests\sessions.py", line 589, in request
    resp = self.send(prep, **send_kwargs)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\ComfyUI_windows_portable\python_embeded\Lib\site-packages\requests\sessions.py", line 703, in send
    r = adapter.send(request, **kwargs)
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

    raise ConnectionError(e, request=request)
requests.exceptions.ConnectionError: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='raw.githubusercontent.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /CompVis/stable-diffusion/main/configs/stable-diffusion/v1-inference.yaml (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0x000001E690227290>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 11004] getaddrinfo failed'))
author: coddz

comments.body: We have just fixed the issue you mentioned about repeatedly getting models from the Internet. Please re-install Comfyui-MVAdapter. If you still have the problem, feel free to report it here.

Thank you, Mr huanngzh.

after I redownloaded the comfyui-mvadapter and tested, each time running the workflow couldn't connect github repetitavely .

title: Several models were automatically downloaded and all of them were stuffed into the cache space of the C drive
body: C drive is limited, Can the author modify the code to change the model into Comfyui/models?
author: coddz

comments.body:
the requirements.txt need checking and changing, for example: 
torch>=2.1.1
torchvision>=0.16.1
diffusers>=0.31.0
transformers>=4.46.3
peft
numpy>=1.26.2
huggingface_hub>=0.24.6
accelerate>=1.1.1

the torch version is too low, may cause a lot of custom nodes failure.
the checkpoint(sdxl) and vae(sdxl) of diffusers loader maybe select from the local like ldm, avoid downloading the sdxl base repetitavely.

Thanks for your suggestions! The above issues have been solved.

Btw, `diffusers` will not download the checkpoints repetitavely due to its cache mechanism. Now the cache dir has been set to `ComfyUI/models/diffusers`.
